education.description: Distributed System, Enterprise Application Development , Enterprise Software Platform
Software Engineering, Software Testing, Database Management Systems

projects.title: NwSense
projects.description: built a website to provide a solution for accessing the configurations of home network from external network. User can block Ip address, websites and can see a detailed analysis of his home network on the website. Used Raspberry Pi as a proxy server and hosted website on AWS. The data from Raspberry Pi stored on IBM Cloudant database and web server used a set of Restful APIâ€™s to communicate.

projects.title: Expense Management System
projects.description: An expense management application to store and update office expenses using flask built in Restful manner. Objective to explore MySQL RDBMS using Flask-SQLAlchemy. Dockerized the application and database. Implemented client side sharding using consistent hashing client.

projects.title: Automated Class Attendance system
projects.description: Developed an automated attendance supervising system using Django in Team of 4 as a class project. It uses the BLE component of smartphones and RaspberryPi to check for the attendance. The backend server handles the business logic of tracking student attendance and also uses a set of REST APIs for mobile app and Raspberry Pi client to communicate.
